name: Krzysztof Lorys
content: Krzysztof Lorys Krzysztof Loryś Welcome to my home page. It contains: About me Research interests Current research topics Papers (includes pointers to papers available via net) Schedule and teaching Office hours My addresses and telephones Private info About me Krzysztof Loryś, born on July 20, 1958 in Jawor. Graduated in computer science in 1981, Ph.D. in 1989, habilitation in 2000 from University of Wroclaw. Currently professor at University of Wroclaw. Research interests Approximation algorithms Parallel computations Computational complexity Formal languages Current research topics Periodic sorting networks Switching networks Other activities Member of Program Committee of  Polish Olympiad in Informatics Member of Advisory Board of Axit Polska Member of Scientic Board of Signet Teaching Current courses · Algorytmy i Struktury Danych · Metody implementacji algorytmów · XIV LO Courses taught previously · Algorytmy i Struktury Danych · Kryptografia · Kryptografia II · Matematyka Dyskretna · Metody probabilistyczne · Seminarium: Złożoność Obliczeniowa · Wstęp do programowania · Złożoność Obliczeniowa Office hours Wednesday, 13.15-14.00 My addresses and telephones Office: Institute of Computer Science University of Wroclaw ul. Joliot-Curie 15 50-383 Wroclaw, Poland room: 345 phone: (+48+71)-3757-035 fax: (+48+71)-325-12-71 E-mail to: lorys@ii.uni.wroc.pl Przeglad zastosowan informatyki
